>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
(Institution01 and Institution02, 2003)
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
apa-x.csl
<<===== CSL =====<<

>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
	{
		"title" : "This is some title",
		"volume" : "2003",
		"author": [
          {
			"literal" : "Institution01"
		  },
          {
			"literal" : "Institution02"
		  }
        ],
		"issued" : {
			"date-parts": [
			[2003,1] ]
		}
	}
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
